metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a Gur Hunter at the Gur Camp in Wyrm's Crossing. Hunter is morose, fatalistic.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur CampApproach the camp and talk to Gur Leader and the Entrance Guard.Click on this Gur Hunter.

1.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
1.text: To lose our children is a tragedy. To fail so utterly in saving them is something else entirely.

0.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
0.text: Ulma insists the tribe is not cursed, but I have my doubts.

2.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
2.text: First we lose our children, then Gandrel, and now this?

3.speaker: Oliver Quarlic
3.text: Perhaps the gods have abandoned us. Perhaps they have abandoned all of Faerûn.
